Summary Note:
The RM met Giulia  Leonardi during a business conference in Rome. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Giulia  Leonardi is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of experience.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
Family Background: Giulia  Leonardi has been happily married to Fantini since 2017. Together they have 3 kids called Martina, Romano and Cecilia.
Education Background:
Giulia obtained her secondary school diploma from Istituto Tecnico Industriale Statale Enrico Mattei Roma in 2000.
Giulia pursued higher education at Polytechnic University of Turin, graduating in 2006.
Occupation History:
Giulia  Leonardi is a 43 year old Shipping Company Owner from Italy.
Giulia  Leonardi launched her career as a Ship Broker at Grimaldi Group S.p.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2005 to 2008.
In 2009, she moved to MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company S.A. to work as a Shipping Company Owner, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 140000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has villa located in Bologna, worth 2160000 EUR.

She purchased townhouse in Messina, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1100000 EUR.

Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, she received an inheritance of 420000 EUR in 2014, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
